title: Trump has previewed $2k checks. Here's what Americans think.

title: Bill Clinton among VIPs in new Epstein file photographs

title: Elise Stefanik exits NY governor's race, will leave Congress
shortDescription: The 41-year-old was the youngest woman elected to the House and transformed from a moderate to MAGA brawler in her defense of Trump and his agenda.

title: See Charlie Kirk's mic, Trump merch, ICE trucks at AmericaFest 2025
shortDescription: Turning Point's AmericaFest attracts thousands each year to the annual Phoenix event. Photos highlight interesting moments and scenes from the event.
